hero.title: A11i Detector: Your Web Accessibility Expert
hero.description: Automatically discover and report accessibility issues on your website. An intelligent tool that acts as an accessibility expert to ensure compliance with the European Accessibility Law and WCAG guidelines.

items.title: Automated Analysis
items.description: Complete website scanning with automatic detection of issues according to WCAG 2.1 Level AA and compliance with the EN 301 549 technical standard.

items.title: Detailed Reports
items.description: Complete reports with severity and priority, specific correction recommendations and step-by-step guides to implement solutions.

items.title: Guided Correction
items.description: Provides step-by-step guides and practical solutions to implement the necessary corrections in your code.

items.title: Continuous Integration
items.description: Integrates into your development workflow to maintain accessibility as part of the quality process.

items.title: Companies and Organizations
items.description: For companies that need to comply with the European Accessibility Law and ensure their websites are inclusive for all users.

items.title: Web Developers
items.description: For development teams that want to integrate accessibility from the earliest stages of development and maintain quality standards.

items.title: Agencies and Consultants
items.description: For digital agencies that offer accessibility services and need efficient tools to audit and improve their projects.

items.title: Public Institutions
items.description: For government entities and public organizations that must comply with mandatory digital accessibility regulations.
